18/* Get unsetenv(). It can be used without error checking. */
19#include "setenv.h"
20
21#ifdef __cplusplus
22extern "C" {
23#endif
24
25/* Set NAME to VALUE in the environment.
26 If REPLACE is nonzero, overwrite an existing value.
27 With error checking. */
28extern void xsetenv (const char *name, const char *value, int replace);
29
30#ifdef __cplusplus
31}
32#endif
